author: cezar
msg: Website update to reflect v2.2.0 release. Added v2.2.0 docs and new article in the Documentation section.

author: mharwood
msg: Added new TermsQueryBuilder to simply build boolean queries from text without having concern over clashing reserved words/special characters/legal syntax that is demanded by normal query parser syntax. Added new xml attributes to BooleanQueryBuilder to control disableCoord and minimumNumberShouldMatch.
